mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mb_dict_data(dict_code, dict_from_system, k, v, create_time, update_time) VALUES
(#{item.dictCode}, #{item.dictFromSystem}, #{item.k}, #{item.v}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dict_code = VALUES(dict_code), dict_from_system = VALUES(dict_from_system), k = VALUES(k), v = VALUES(v), create_time = VALUES(create_time), update_time = VALUES(update_time)
